mapper.insert: insert into board(EVENTNM, OPAR, EVENTCO, EVENTSTARTDATE, EVENTENDDATE, EVENTSTARTTIME, EVENTENDTIME, CHRGEINFO, MNNST, AUSPCINSTT, PHONENUMBER, SUPRTINSTT, SEATNUMBER, ADMFEE, ENTNCAGE, DSCNTINFO, ATPN, HOMEPAGEURL, ADVANTKINFO, PRKPLCEYN, RDNMADR, LNMADR, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, REFERENCEDATE) values(#{eventNm}, #{opar}, #{eventCo}, #{eventStartDate}, #{eventEndDate}, #{eventStartTime}, #{eventEndTime}, #{chrgeInfo}, #{mnnst}, #{auspcInstt}, #{phoneNumber}, #{suprtInstt}, #{seatNumber}, #{admfee}, #{entncAge}, #{dscntInfo}, #{atpn}, #{homepageUrl}, #{advantkInfo}, #{prkplceYn}, #{rdnmadr}, #{lnmadr}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{referenceDate} )
